price: И ни у ком случају не реци: „Урадићу то сигурно сутра!“
arabic: وَلَا تَقُولَنَّ لِشَاْيۡءٍ إِنِّي فَاعِلٞ ذَٰلِكَ غَدًا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walā taqūlanna lishāy'in innī fāʿilun dhālika ghadan
